data.body: Find the number of diagonals in the Convex N-gon.

hints.hint1: Choose $2$ points as opposite ends of diagonals, but sides are not diagonal
hints.hint2: If we combinatorially formulate Hint 1, we get ${N\choose2} - N$.

data.input_format:
The first line contains T (1 ≤ T ≤ 100000), the number of test cases.
Each of the next T lines contains a positive integer N denoting the number of sides of convex polygon (3 ≤ N ≤ 109).
data.output_format: For each test case, print a single number denoting the number of diagonals in the convex N-gon. Since answer can be large, print it with modulo 1000000007.
data.title: Number of Diagonals
